nodes.text: Skirmish between the Admonitor and Creysis's scout squadron

In 2 ABY, a  skirmish occurred between the Imperial Star Destroyer Admonitor and a scout squadron of Ebruchi Pirates. The battle was one-sided as Imperial forces easily destroyed almost all of the Ebruchi ships, with only eight escaping. Following this skirmish, the Admonitor was able to track down one of the escaping fighters to the location of the Ebruchi's leader.
